EmailTemplate.name: Policy Violation
EmailTemplate.Body: A violation of policy '$policyName' rule '$constraintName' was detected on user '$identityName'.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying policy owners of violations.

Argument.name: identity
Argument.Description: The Identity object that has the violation.

Argument.name: policy
Argument.Description: The Policy object containing the constraint that was violated.

Argument.name: constraint
Argument.Description: A subclass of BaseConstraint representing the policy rule that was violated.

Argument.name: violation
Argument.Description: The PolicyViolation object created to represent the violation.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity object that has the violation.

Argument.name: policyName
Argument.Description: The name of the Policy object.

Argument.name: constraintName
Argument.Description: The name of the constraint (aka rule) within the policy.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Policy violation by $identityName
